channel.title: Help Needed On How To Put My Server Together :s
channel.description:
[center]Right i've been following lots of different guides and to be honest now iam pretty baffeld as they all say different things i have downloaded a source and i have this in it :
[IMG]http://i616.photobucket.com/albums/tt250/Vengency_team_Gaming/files.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i616.photobucket.com/albums/tt250/Vengency_team_Gaming/info.jpg[/img]
Iam not sure where to go from here i know i should be opening the file GUI.JAVA and changing the ip from the moparscape one to mine but different guides tell me different things so do i put bl1scape.no-ip.biz in for the ip ive got from no-ip or even put my ipv4 in there ?
Ive got this for the no-ip:
[IMG]http://i616.photobucket.com/albums/tt250/Vengency_team_Gaming/no-ip.jpg[/img]
I'am not sure what portforwarding is but ive had ago at doing it please let me know if its wrong :
[IMG]http://i616.photobucket.com/albums/tt250/Vengency_team_Gaming/portforwarding.jpg[/img]
Please tell me what iam doing wrong or what i need to do, i will give +rep and be very very grateful and iam sure this will help other poeple.
Thanks alot brad.[/center]

item.title: Help Needed On How To Put My Server Together :s
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

btw you’re not blaccking out your ip address pretty good seeing as i can read it.

as for the client, you don’t use the no-ip for youself, you just use onf of the following:
localhost
127.0.0.1
0.0.0.0
192.100.0.102

well just use those and then try logging in. should work really…

Read full topic
item.source: Help Needed On How To Put My Server Together :s
